title: Back panel 4 XL is moving away
content: Hey. I recently found the back glass on my phone in the upper right corner is coming off. I did not drop my smartphone. Ð•here was news that this is a factory defect. I've been trying for an hour and a half to find either a support chat or an email address, but I'm being directed around by silly clues. I'm very upset and don't know what to do.
